summary: This bill, the Strengthening Agency Management and Oversight of Software Assets Act, mandates that federal agencies improve the management and oversight of their software assets. It requires agencies to conduct a comprehensive assessment of their software, including entitlements and costs, and develop plans for consolidation, cost reduction, and improved interoperability. The bill also directs the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to provide guidance and the Government Accountability Office to report on agency practices.
